attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the SIA licensing system and replace with a more effective and less beaurocratic method

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

At the moment your petition reads: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to David Samuel John Buchanan.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
